Package <Unnamed>

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    WordCount
    This counts the occurrences of words in ColumnFamily cql3_worldcount ( id uuid, line text, PRIMARY KEY (id)) For each word, we output the total number of occurrences across all body texts.
    WordCount
    This counts the occurrences of words in ColumnFamily Standard1, that has a single column (that we care about) "text" containing a sequence of words.
    WordCount.ReducerToCassandra  
    WordCount.ReducerToFilesystem  
    WordCount.TokenizerMapper  
    WordCountCounters
    This sums the word count stored in the input_words_count ColumnFamily for the key "key-if-verse1".
    WordCountCounters
    This sums the word count stored in the input_words_count ColumnFamily for the key "sum".
    WordCountCounters.ReducerToFilesystem  
    WordCountCounters.SumMapper  
    WordCountCounters.SumNativeMapper  
    WordCountSetup  
    WordCountSetup
